title: Anthropic officially bans using subscription auth for third party use
author: theahura
aiHeadline: Anthropic pulls the plug on third-party subscriptions, because who needs another layer of bureaucracy in their life? Now you can't even borrow someone else's subscription to get a subscription.

title: Gemini 3.1 Pro
author: PunchTornado
aiHeadline: Gemini 3.1 Pro drops, and everyone's confused because there are two different Gemini 3.1 Pro announcements. Which one is real? Probably the one that makes you feel inadequate about your own intelligence.

title: AI makes you boring
author: speckx
aiHeadline: AI makes you boring? No, AI is just the latest excuse for people to blame technology for their own lack of creativity. Meanwhile, AI is out there making everyone else boring too. Thanks, AI!

title: Gemini 3.1 Pro
author: MallocVoidstar
aiHeadline: Gemini 3.1 Pro is back in the news, and honestly, we're all just here for the free snacks and the chance to say 'I told you so.'

title: Show HN: Micasa â€“ track your house from the terminal
author: cpcloud
aiHeadline: Show HN: Micasa lets you track your house from the terminal. Because who needs a smartphone when you can just type commands into a black-and-white interface? Now your house can be as exciting as your terminal.
